Renunciation Rodeo Global Sangha is an Out of the Mud Intersangha meeting\n\nConf ID: 883 7229 7809 Password: 1989

A Recovery Dharma Meditation &amp\; Discussion Group

Join us at Harbor of Hope Sangha\, a safe and supportive space where we explore mindfulness\, meditation\, and Buddhist-inspired recovery principles. Like a harbor offering refuge from turbulent waters\, this meeting provides a place to pause\, reflect\, and connect with others on the path of healing.

Each session includes a guided meditation\, an exploration of Recovery Dharma principles\, and open sharing in a compassionate community. Whether you're new to meditation or an experienced practitioner\, all are welcome.

Meeting ID: 873 1789 9454 / Passcode: healing

summary: (75 min) RD Mental Health Awakening Minds
description: (6:00 PM PT) (75 min) RD Mental Health "Awakening Minds" **Must be signed into a free Zoom account**\n\nID 872 3125 7242 - Waiting Room

This is a Recovery Dharma meeting that uses Community Reinforcement and Family Training (CRAFT) method to offer a unique blend of mindfulness-based recovery and evidence-based strategies for family support. This Sangha is for those affected by a loved one's addictive behaviors.

Research shows that CRAFT significantly increases the likelihood of renunciation compared to traditional methods or formal interventions.

(To Guard against Zoom disrupters\, YOU MUST BE SIGNED INTO ZOOM!)

Zoom ID: 424 334 9090 Zoom PW: 311311 (YOU MUST BE SIGNED INTO ZOOM )

summary: Recovery Dharma – Refuge In The Desert Newcomers
description:
Newcomer Orientation (20-minute duration) for those new to Recovery Dharma or Buddhist-based recovery.
Orientation is followed by an online Recovery Dharma meeting at 7:30 pm MST

Zoom Meeting ID: 825 8152 9670 Pass Code: 348348

Hybrid. 2650 Ridge Ave.\, Room 5413 Evanston\, IL Leave yourself 5 minutes to get to the meeting room. Enter at main hospital entrance\, take a right turn and walk down the corridor to Elevator F. Take that to 5th floor. Exit the elevator at 5th floor\, follow the hallway to the left/follow signs to Chapman Center. UPDATE: Please check back frequently for updates to our meeting directory and email rdevanston@gmail.com with your questions. Thank you! You are invited to share a reading or meditation by submitting it to either Chris or Craig at the emails below at least the Thursday before the meeting. We will leave phones open for the first few minutes of the meeting if you need last minute directions. The contacts/facilitators are: Chris: phone 312-618-1520 \; email morganca@gmail.com. Craig: phone 312-969-0404 \; email dcledford@aol.com.

summary: Middle Tyger - Yoga Get It and Go
description:
Join us for Middle Tyger Sangha’s Yoga Express\, a 60-minute Recovery Dharma meeting designed to fit into your lunch hour.
This meeting integrates mindful movement with approximately 20 minutes each of:
Accessible/Chair Yoga or Qigong– Gentle\, beginner-friendly movements to ease tension and cultivate presence.
Meditation – A guided savasana &amp\; transition to recovery sharing
Recovery Check-in
All are welcome\, regardless of experience with yoga or meditation. Come as you are and take what you need.

Our Recovery Dharma gathering for those seeking healing and freedom from addiction with the guidance of Buddhist teachings.
We meet in person\, in the lower level of the new meditation hall\, and are a peer-facilitated group.
While Zoom continues to be an option for our weekly practices\, we sometimes experience connection challenges. Thank you for your patience! We are grateful for your dedication to practice with disruption.
